message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $130. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Can you meet me there?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking to get a good deal, but I'm afraid I can't meet you at $110. I'm willing to compromise and offer you the product for $125. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I need to be more careful with my budget. Can you meet me at $115?

I understand your concerns, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable meeting you at $115. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer you the product for $127. This is my final offer, so I hope you can meet me in the middle.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short. Can you meet me at $118?

I'm sorry, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any higher than $127. I've already compromised a lot, and I need to make sure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to wait for a better offer or consider selling it to someone else.
I understand you've already compromised a lot, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Can you meet me at $120?
